title: I DIDN'T GET A CHAMP OR A SKIN FROM RIOT FOR OCEAN WEEK :(
body: Dear riot i didn't get a champion or a skin for ocean but got 5 points please fix up ur system

replies.body:
Hey bob333,

They are still in the process of distributing the mystery champion/skin. Please refer to this thread for details; http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/LryNggNH-ocean-week-mystery-champion-update

-DTN
